title: setup
content:
install:
```
sudo apt install mysql-server
```

check: 
```
sudo systemctl status mysql
mysql --version
```
tip:
```
sudo /etc/init.d/mysql start
```

setup:
```
sudo mysql_secure_installation
```

connect (auth_socket):
```
sudo mysql
```

hint for set pass level:
```
SET GLOBAL validate_password.policy=LOW;
```

get info:
```
SELECT user,authentication_string,plugin,host FROM mysql.user;
```

change pass type:
```
ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY '###password###';
```

reset:
```
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
```

connect (mysql_native_password):
```
mysql -u root -p
```

create new user:
```
CREATE USER 'dora_server'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY '###password###';

GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'dora_server'@'localhost' WITH GRANT OPTION;
```
